author: mxmanghi
msg: * rivet/packages/dio/dio_Postgresql.tcl: reindented and tabs converted to spaces
* rivet/packages/dio/sql.tcl: class DIO::Sql now returning basic SELECT SQL statements

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5552: Leader recovery process can select the wrong leader if all replicas for a shard are down and trying to recover as well as lose updates that should have been recovered.
SOLR-5569 A replica should not try and recover from a leader until it has published that it is ACTIVE.
SOLR-5568 A SolrCore cannot decide to be the leader just because the cluster state says no other SolrCore's are active.
